mapper.select: SELECT dc.id AS config_id, dc.task_id, dc.case_id, dc.type, dc.participator_id, dc.participator_name, dc.device_id, dd.device_name, dd.device_type, dd.support_roles, dd.ip, dd.service_address, dd.data_channel, dd.command_channel, dd.`status` AS device_status, dd.last_online_date from tj_task_data_config dc LEFT JOIN tj_device_detail dd ON dd.device_id = dc.device_id where dc.task_id = #{taskId} and (dc.case_id = #{caseId} or dc.case_id = 0)

SELECT ttc.id as task_case_id, ttc.case_id, ttc.task_id, sd.NAME AS scene_name, sd.all_stage_label, tc.scene_detail_id, tc.resources_detail_id, tc.detail_info, tc.route_file, tc.`status`, rd.file_path, rd.attribute4 FROM tj_task_case ttc LEFT JOIN tj_case tc ON tc.id = ttc.case_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT fsd.id, fs.NAME, fsd.all_stage_label FROM tj_fragmented_scene_detail fsd LEFT JOIN tj_fragmented_scenes fs ON fsd.fragmented_scene_id = fs.id) sd ON sd.id = tc.scene_detail_id LEFT JOIN tj_task_data_config dc ON dc.task_id = ttc.task_id LEFT JOIN tj_resources_detail rd ON rd.id = tc.resources_detail_id
WHERE ttc.id = #{taskCaseId}
mapper.update: update tj_task_case set status = #{status}, passing_rate = #{passingRate}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, test_total_time = #{testTotalTime}, sort = #{sort}, connect_info = #{connectInfo} where id = #{id}

update tj_task_case set status = 'waiting', passing_rate = null, start_time = null, end_time = null, test_total_time = null where id in
#{id}
